long_description: The Easton EA70 Front Road Wheel offers hand-built quality and performance for dependable all-around road use, whether training, commuting or riding long weekend club rides. Featuring a 17.5mm internal rim width, the extra wide alloy rim creates more surface area for traction when leaning into corners. The Easton EA70 Front Road Wheel is built with even, accurate spoke tension for outstanding durability. Easton V5 hub uses long-lasting sealed cartridge bearings.
short_description: The Easton EA70 Front Road Wheel offers hand-built quality and performance for dependable all-around road use, whether training, commuting or riding long weekend club rides.
